issue.title: [Python] Implement a transient list serialization function that can handle a mix of scalars, lists, ndarrays, dicts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-759](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-759). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would be similar to what's in https://github.com/ray-project/ray/tree/master/src/numbuf, but take advantage of the new Tensor container / metadata / serialization.

comments.body:
